H0.text: The trade union Unison was formed by a merger of NALGO, NUPE and which other union. ASTMS

H1.text: The trade union Unison was formed by a merger of NALGO, NUPE and which other union. UCATT

H2.text: The trade union Unison was formed by a merger of NALGO, NUPE and which other union. EETPU

H3.text: The trade union Unison was formed by a merger of NALGO, NUPE and which other union. COHSE

A4.text: Unison was formed in 1993 when NALGO, NUPE and COHSE merged.

A5.text: Unison was formed by merging NALGO, NUPE and COHSE.
